product.name: 1. IDLY

product.name: 2.PONGAL

product.name: 3. DOSA
product.description: Idly and dosa are also same description!!

product.name: 4. PAROTA
product.description: Parathas are one of the most popular unleavened flatbreads in the Indian Subcontinent, made by baking or cooking whole wheat dough on a tava, and finishing off with shallow frying. ... The flour used is finely ground wholemeal (atta) and the dough is shallow fried!!

product.name: 5. CHICKEN BIRYANI
product.description: Chicken biryani is made with Indian spices, rice, and meat, and sometimes, in addition, eggs and/or potatoes in certain regional varieties. Biryani is popular throughout the Indian subcontinent, as well as among its diaspora!!

product.name: 6. RICE
product.description: Rice is the seed of the grass species Oryza glaberrima or Oryza sativa. As a cereal grain, it is the most widely consumed staple food for a large part of the world's human population, especially in Asia and Africa. It is the agricultural commodity with the third-highest worldwide production, after sugarcane and maize!!

product.name: 7. TOMATO RICE
product.description: Tomato rice is tasteful and less prize!!

product.name: 8. PAROTA
product.description: Parathas are one of the most popular unleavened flatbreads in the Indian Subcontinent, made by baking or cooking whole wheat dough on a tava, and finishing off with shallow frying. ... The flour used is finely ground wholemeal (atta) and the dough is shallow fried!!

product.name: 11. EGG NOODLES
product.description: Egg Noodles is good taste food!!

product.name: 12. EGG RICE
